premise_source_doc_sentence: The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American science fiction thriller film loosely based on the Philip K. Dick short story , `` Adjustment Team '' .

claim: The Adjustment Bureau is loosely based on a work by Tom Clancy.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film tells the story of a young man who discovers that what appear to be chance events in his life are controlled by a technologically advanced intelligence network .

claim: The Adjustment Bureau is loosely based on a work by Tom Clancy.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After an event not planned by these controllers occurs -- a romantic encounter with a young dancer -- he struggles against their manipulation despite their promise of a great future for him .
